text: Danville is a borough in and the county seat of Montour County, Pennsylvania, United States. It is along the North Branch of the Susquehanna River. Danville was home to 8,042 people in 1900, 7,517 people in 1910, and 7,122 people in 1940. The population was 4,239 at the 2020 census. ==References== ==Other websites== * DanvillePA.com, sponsored by the Press-Enterprise * Danvilleboro.org * Iron Heritage Festival Category:Boroughs in Pennsylvania Category:County seats in Pennsylvania
title: Danville, Pennsylvania
